title: lyra_(pokemon)
body:
[b]Lyra[/b], known as [b]Kotone[/b] (コトネ) in Japan, is the female player character in [i][[pokemon hgss|Pokémon HeartGold and SoulSilver]][/i].

This highly curious, active young Trainer cherishes the bonds she has with her Pokémon. She is always doting on them.

She has [[brown eyes]] and [[long hair|long]] [[brown hair]] worn in [[twintails]]. She wears a [[white headwear|white]] [[cabbie hat]] with a [[red bow|red]] [[hat bow|bow]], a [[red shirt]], [[blue overalls]], [[white thighhighs]], [[red footwear|red]] [[shoes]], and carries a [[pokegear|Pokégear]] attached to a [[yellow bag]].

title: shaka_sign
body:
The 🤙 gesture. A gesture made with the thumb and pinkie raised, and the index, middle, and ring fingers clenched to the palm of the hand. Associated with [[surfing]] culture.

Also used to mean "call me" when held with the thumb near the ear and the pinky near the mouth. Also used to mean "six" in Chinese culture.

Don't be confused with these gestures:
[[\n/]] (🤘) - The index and pinkie fingers are held out.
[[\m/]] (🤟) - The thumb, index and pinkie fingers are held out.

h4. Examples
* !post #5974956
* !post #6470956

h4. Non-examples
* !post #3253586: [[\n/]] (🤘) - thumb is held down
* !post #2286992: [[\m/]] (🤟)

h4. See also
* [[Tag Group:Gestures]]

h4. External links
* "Wikipedia: Shaka sign":[https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Shaka_sign]

title: shigure_(azur_lane)
body:
Personification of the Japanese destroyer [i]Shigure[/i] (時雨) in [[Azur Lane]].
Character design by [[Saru]], voiced by [[Kuwahara Yuuki]].

Shigure has an aggressive and impatient personality, often remarking on her luck while considering everyone but herself an idiot. She also maintains a fierce rivalry against Yukikaze while showing relative respect towards Yamashiro. Her rivalry with Yukikaze is reflective of the real-life fame of both ships ("Shigure of Sasebo" and "Yukikaze of Kure", and both ships have skills explicitly named as such that reduce damage taken in battles).

Shigure has [[long hair|long]] [[black hair]] tied in a [[ponytail]], [[red eyes]], [[wolf ears]], and [[wolf tail]]. She wears a modified [[serafuku]] with a black [[crop top]] and a [[white sailor collar]] with a [[red ribbon]]. Below the waist, she has a [[white skirt|white]], [[pleated skirt|pleated]] [[miniskirt]]. She wears [[white sock|white]] [[loose socks]], and sports a pair of decorative leather [[cuffs]].

Her [[rigging]] consists of a single quad [[torpedo tubes|torpedo tube]] on her left, and a single twin [[ship turret|turret]] on her right. On her back is a [[smokestack]].

h4. Skins

title: colorado_(azur_lane)
body:
[[Personification]] of the nameship of the USS Colorado-class battleships with the callsign BB-45 as depicted in [[Azur Lane]], and also one of the "Big Seven". She was initially introduced alongside her sisters in Fallen Wings event on the Chinese server in December 2017. However, a conflict between Yostar and the artist that designed Colorado and her sisters had made the event delayed for other servers until October 2018 when another artist was commissioned to redesign her.

h4. Appearance
Her "original design" by [[Rail (Silverbow)]] (post #2973322) portrays her with [[long hair|long]] [[black hair]], wears a blue and white [[sleeveless shirt]], a [[black_skirt|black]] [[pencil skirt]], a [[white thighhighs]] and a pair of white [[cross-laced_footwear|cross-laced]] [[high heel boots]] that displays her hull number. She also wears a [[garrison cap]] with a [[hat feather]].

Eventually on October 2018, Yostar commissioned another artist, [[Chuzenji]] to redesign her. Under the redesign (post #3297428), Colorado and her sisters is now themed after gothic vampires. For Colorado, she now sports a long [[white hair]]. She still wears a sleeveless shirt albeit now in black and white and showing her [[sideboob]], as well as a black [[coat]]. Her legwear is now changed to a cross-laced [[thigh_boots|thighhigh boots]] and no longer having a cap.

h4. History
In real life, [i]Colorado[/i] was the first of her class to receive upgrades that were originally planned in 1940. These were to have replaced her 127 mm single mounts with the newer twin mounts Mk. 28 that were entering service with the [[North Carolina (Azur Lane)|]] and [[South Dakota (Azur Lane)|]] classes but she only received torpedo bulges on the West Coast given the dire urgency of the situation, and thus was spared from damage when Pearl Harbor was attacked.

Little to no modifications were afforded to her and her sister [[Maryland (Azur Lane)|]] apart from rolling upgrades to their AA guns, while they saw service for patrol and shore bombardment duties through the war. She arrived in Leyte Gulf too late to participate in the battle, and was decommissioned in 1947.

h4. Skins

title: \n/
body:
The 🤘 hand gesture. The index and pinkie fingers are raised, while the middle and ring fingers are held down by the thumb.

Known in the West as "the sign of the horns", "the devil's horns", or "throwing the horns". Often associated with [[heavy metal]] music, which was made popular by [[Ronnie James Dio]]. Originated as an apotropaic gesture to ward off the "evil eye," a curse cast by [[glaring]] at someone with hostility.

Not to be confused with [[\m/]] (🤟) (when the thumb is held out) or with [[fox shadow puppet]] (when the fingers are extended forward to make a fox muzzle).

h4. Examples

* !post #3253586
* !post #1284631
* !post #3780741: [[Double \n/]]

h4. Non-examples

* !post #1064629: [[Fox shadow puppet]]
* !post #7416767: [[\m/]] (🤟)

h4. See also

* [[double \n/]]
* [[fox shadow puppet]]
* [[shaka sign]] 🤙
* [[\m/]] 🤟
* [[\||/]]
* [[Tag group:Gestures]]

title: \m/
body:
The 🤟 hand gesture. The thumb, index, and pinkie fingers are held out, while the middle and ring fingers touch the palm of the hand.

Not to be confused with [[\n/]] (🤘), where the thumb is held down instead of extended out.

In anime, it is well known for being part of the [[Sailor Moon]]'s famous [[Tsuki ni kawatte oshioki yo]] ("I'll punish you") pose, for [[Ranka Lee]]'s dance move in [[Macross Frontier]] while singing the song [[Seikan Hikou]], and for the association with [[Yazawa Nico]]'s catchphrase, [[nico nico nii]].

In American sign language it's known as the "I Love You" sign, after a combination of the ASL signs for the letters I, L, and Y. 

h4. Examples

* !post #7416767
* !post #2286992
* !post #7071092: [[Double \m/]]

[[Succubus Stayed Life]] ("Life with a succubus") is an erotic doujin manga by [[Sasamori Tomoe]]. The male protagonist meets the self-proclaimed "succubus", [[Sakuramachi Touko]], and they eventually get into a sex friend relationship. But soon, both the protagonists childhood friend, [[Yomisawa Tsukino]], as well as [[Sakuramachi Touko|Touko's]] "succubus" friend, [[Akizono Kanna]], appears...
Adapted into an adult light novel, written by "Honjou Yagi":[https://www.amazon.co.jp/%E3%81%BB%E3%82%93%E3%81%98%E3%82%87%E3%81%86-%E5%B1%B1%E7%BE%8A/e/B00J216S5O/] (external link), in 2017.

h4.Characters
* [[Sakuramachi Touko]]
* [[Yomisawa Tsukino]]
* [[Akizono Kanna]]
other_names: サキュバステードライフ

title: suzuhara_lulu
body:
A former [[Nijisanji]] affiliated [[virtual youtuber|VTuber]]. She debuted on the same day as [[Yukishiro Mahiro]].

Due to some odd events (such as streaming ten hours of [[Ring Fit Adventure]] [i] immediately after[/i] streaming ten hours of [[Dark Souls I]]), Lulu gained a reputation for behaving like some sort of inhuman creature, a notion further developed by her habit of staring directly at the viewer when something doesn't go as it should and her weird remarks like implying her eyeballs can regenerate after being crushed, while claiming to be nothing but a normal college student.

She is part of the [[Saine Sisters]] trio along with [[Kamishiro Kurea]] and [[Sephira Su]], as the three virtual youtubers were designed by [[Saine]] and consider themselves sisters, sometimes appearing in each other channels.

Unexpectedly announced she would be graduating and ceasing activities on June 30, 2021.

title: nimu_(vtuber)
body:
A [[real life|streamer]] from [[Argentina]] who started her activities in February of 2020 as an [[indie virtual youtuber|indie]] [[Virtual YouTuber|VTuber]]. She mainly did gaming content, but later, on [[Twitch.tv|Twitch]], began preferring chatting and reaction streams over videogames. By September 2021, she was among the top most subscribed Latin American VTubers, and among its most infamous. She retired from VTubing on November 17th, 2023, after a series of allegations against her were confirmed, and briefly stepped out of the limelight, before later returning as a regular streamer.

According to her VTuber lore, her true body is the purple [[blob]] in her head, which is actually an alien parasite that has spent thousands of years switching into and out of human bodies (with the promise that she'll fulfill whatever wish they want, so long as she gets to take control). Her current host is a [[brown hair|brown-haired]] girl nicknamed [[Centi (Nimu)|]].

h4. Costumes

title: day-night_toggle_button_(meme)
body:
Day-Night Toggle Button is an exploitable comparison meme in which people post images of what they do and how they act during the day and what they do and how they act at night. The format of the meme uses two-panels and the digital day and night toggle buttons found on smart phones and other electronic devices designed to designate "night mode" from "day mode."

h4. See also

* [[baby mode sexy mode (meme)]]


h4. External links

* "Day-Night Toggle Button | Know Your Meme":[https://knowyourmeme.com/memes/day-night-toggle-button]

title: airplane_arms
body:
Pretending to be an [[airplane]] by [[spread arms|spreading the arms]] straight out to the sides, usually while running or otherwise in motion.

In Japanese, the [[sound effects|sound effect]] of an [[airplane]] flying is ブーン ("bu-n"). Consequently, airplane arms are known as "bu-n" in Japanese. "Bu-n" is also a nickname and catchphrase of "内藤ホライゾン" (Naitou Horizon), an [[ASCII art]] character who is a mascot for [[2channel]]'s VIP board.

h4. Examples

* !post #169049
* !post #7784157

h4. See also

* [[Spread arms]]

h4. External links

* "2ch Ascii-art Illustrations (JP): 'Naitou Horizon'":http://riceballman.fc2web.com/AA-Illust/Data/NaitoHorizon.html

title: hilda_(under_night_in-birth)
body:
[b]Hilda[/b] is one of the antagonists of the story in [[Under Night In-Birth]]. She is one of the founders of the faction, [b]Amnesia[/b]. Her main goal is to become a Re-Birth and plans to shape the Hollow Night in her own image. She is also known as [b]Paradox[/b] by some. She seeks out [[Kido hyde|Hyde]] (whom she calls "Insulator Boy") for the Insulator he posses. In Hilda's ending, [spoiler]she ends up killing both Hyde and [[Linne (under night in-birth)|]], acquiring the Insulator.[/spoiler]   

h5. Voice Actresses

[b]JP:[/b] Takada Hatsumi [b]EN:[/b] [[Allegra Clark]]

title: dagger
body:
A double-edged [[knife]] used for [[stab]]bing or thrusting. They are often a secondary defense [[weapon]] in close combat.

The difference between a dagger and a [[knife]] is that daggers are double-edged or edgeless and intended primarily or exclusively for stabbing, while knives are usually single-edged and intended primarily for cutting. Many knives and daggers are capable of either stabbing or cutting.

h4. Types

* [[kris (weapon)|]]

h4. See also

* [[knife]]
* [[short sword]]
* [[List of weapons]]

title: type-moon
body:
Type-Moon is a Japanese media company founded by [[Nasu Kinoko]] and [[Takeuchi Takashi]].

Originally founded as an eroge doujin circle, it's best known for hits like [[tsukihime|Tsukihime]] and [[fate/stay night|Fate/stay night]]. The former was created when Type-Moon was a mere hobbyist group, whereas the latter's success has established the circle into an established gaming and media company.

This tag is applicable when posts featured references to multiple series done by TYPE-MOON, as well as a reference to its staff.

h4. Related artists

title: standing
body:
One or more characters are standing. Their bodies are being supported by both of their feet, or by either foot.

Most often, standing characters are absolutely upright. Search for {{standing bent_over}} or {{standing leaning_forward}} when they are not.

This tag is still applicable where the character is in the middle of certain actions that keep upright posture such as [[walking]].

h4. See also

* [[Balancing]]
* [[Handstand]]
* [[Rearing]]
* [[Squatting]]
* [[Standing on one leg]]
* [[Tachi-e]] ("standing pictures" used primarily in video games)
* [[Tag group:Posture]]

title: chowder_(series)
body:
Chowder is an American comedy animated television series created by C. H. Greenblatt for [[Cartoon Network]]. It premiered on November 2, 2007, and ended on August 7, 2010, after three seasons with a total of 49 episodes.
The series follows an aspiring young boy named Chowder and his day-to-day adventures as an apprentice in Chef Mung Daal's catering company. Although he means well, Chowder often finds himself in predicaments due to his perpetual appetite and his nature as a scatterbrain. Chowder's guidance in his goal to become a master chef is influenced by Mung's wife, Truffles; Mung's assistant Shnitzel; Mung's rival Ms. Endive; her apprentice Panini, who has a perpetual crush on Chowder; as well as other side characters.

title: fireman's_carry
body:
[[carrying person|Carrying a person]] by placing that person horizontally across the shoulders.

Also refers to various [[wrestling]] and [[judo]] (kata guruma) techniques that utilize this carry after which the performer will then slam his opponent into the ground.

Do not confuse this tag for [[carrying over shoulder]], which means carrying something on one shoulder.

h4. Examples
h6. Correct
* !post #7239779

h6. Incorrect
* !post #343665: [[Carrying over shoulder]]

h4. See also

* [[Sitting on shoulder]]
* [[Princess carry]]
* [[Carrying person]]

title: blackberry_baelz
body:
An [[alternate costume]] of [[hololive English|hololive EN]]'s [[Hakos Baelz]]. Like her earlier [[Strawberry Baelz]] costume, this one is based on a fanmade 3D model by [[Yoolie]].

Combined with a hairstyle change to a [[high ponytail]], the full outfit is an all-black ensemble of [[high heel boots|high-heel]] [[thigh boots]], a sheer [[bodystocking]], a [[thigh strap]], [[short shorts]], a [[bandeau]] top, a cupless [[shrug (clothing)|]], and a [[mouth veil]].

h4. Appearance

* !post #6678794: 3D

title: strawberry_baelz
body:
An [[alternate costume]] of [[hololive English|hololive EN]]'s [[Hakos Baelz]]. Like her later [[Blackberry Baelz]] costume, this one is based on a fanmade 3D model by [[Yoolie]]. The outfit's name was coined by Baelz herself based on its appearance in a live-action segment about a strawberry farm during "her second birthday stream":[https://youtu.be/ts1-_YGubh0?t=1541].

The complete outfit consists of white [[ankle boots]], [[black thighhighs]] with [[animal ear legwear|mouse-shaped thigbands]], denim [[short shorts]], a [[white sweater]] with the same front design as her normal shirt, a [[blue scarf]], and a [[yellow bow|yellow]] [[hair bow]]; her hairstyle also changes to a [[very long hair|very long]] set of [[twin braids]].

h4. Appearance

* !post #6106832: 3D

title: nicoloso_da_recco_(azur_lane)
body:
[[Azur Lane]]'s personification of the Italian [i]Navigatori[/i]-class destroyer [i]Nicoloso da Recco[/i]. Character design by [[Kexue]], voiced by [[Koga Aoi]].

She has [[purple hair]] tied to a long [[braid]] with a [[yellow hairband]], evoking a similarity with [[Hiiragi Tsukasa]]. She also wears a [[black dress]] top, a [[white skirt]], and white [[thighhighs]]. Her [[rigging]] consists of two 533 mm twin [[torpedo tubes]] (historically triple mounts) and two 120 mm twin gun mounts (one hidden by her cape in the CG), one each per side.

In real life, she was the third member of the [i]Navigatori[/i]-class but the only one to survive the war, briefly serving in the post-war Italian navy before being decommissioned in 1954 after 24 years in service.

h4. Skins

title: miki_sayaka
body:
